title: Type Definitions
description: Reusable UI types for data integration.

pidm.domainDescription: Internal identifier for an Identity from Banner

uin.technicalDescription: 9-charater string which may have the form 6nnnnnnnn or @nnnnnnnn where n is a digit in [0...9].

firstName.domainDescription: First given name of a Person.
firstName.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 60 characters.

lastName.domainDescription: Last or family name of a Person.
lastName.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 60 characters.

middleName.domainDescription: Additional given name or names beyond the First Name of a Person.
middleName.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 60 characters.

termCode.domainDescription: Mnemonic abbreviation that identifies an Academic Term.
termCode.technicalDescription: 6-character string of the form nnnnnn where n is a digit in [0..9] and the 1st character is in [1,2,4] designating the UIUC, UIC, UIS campuses.  2nd - 5th characters are the 4 digit calendar year and the 6th character is the starting month of the semester.

termDescription.domainDescription: Text description of an Academic Term calling out the applicable campus, year and semester.
termDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

addressTypeCode.domainDescription: Mnemonic abbreviation that identifies an Address Type.

addressTypeDescription.domainDescription: Text description of an Address Type.
addressTypeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

streetLine1.domainDescription: First street line of an Address.
streetLine1.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 75 characters.

streetLine2.domainDescription: Second street line of an Address.
streetLine2.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 75 characters.

streetLine3.domainDescription: Third street line of an Address.
streetLine3.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 75 characters.

city.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 50 characters.

nationCode.domainDescription: Mnemonic code that identifies a Nation.

nationName.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters

postalCode.domainDescription: Postal service code for a location.
postalCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 10 characters.

employeeStatusCode.domainDescription: Code for the employment status of an Employee.

employeeStatusDescription.domainDescription: Text description for the status of an Employee.
employeeStatusDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum of 50 characters.
employeeStatusDescription.validationRule: IN DECODE('A', 'Active', 'B', 'Leave without pay and with benefits.', 'L', 'Leave without pay and without benefits.', 'F', 'Leave with pay and with benefits.', 'P', 'Leave with partial pay and with benefits.', 'T', 'Terminated')

administrativeCampusCode.technicalDescription: 3-character string of the form n00 where n in [1|2|4].

administrativeCampusName.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

advisorTypeCode.domainDescription: Code for an Academic Advisor Type.

advisorTypeDescription.domainDescription: Description of the Academic Advisor Type.
advisorTypeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

areaCode.domainDescription: The area code portion of a US or Canadian telephone number.

chartCode.domainDescription: Code for a finance ledger chart.
chartCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVCOAS_COAS_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVCOAS A WHERE (FTVCOAS_EFF_DATE, FTVCOAS_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVCOAS_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVCOAS_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVCOAS B WHERE A.FTVCOAS_COAS_CODE = B.FTVCOAS_COAS_CODE AND B.FTVCOAS_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVCOAS_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

chartDescription.domainDescription: Description of the finance ledger chart.
chartDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.
chartDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVCOAS_TITLE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVCOAS A WHERE (FTVCOAS_EFF_DATE, FTVCOAS_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVCOAS_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVCOAS_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVCOAS B WHERE A.FTVCOAS_COAS_CODE = B.FTVCOAS_COAS_CODE AND B.FTVCOAS_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVCOAS_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

organizationCode.domainDescription: Code for a UI Administrative Subunit.
organizationCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVORGN A WHERE (FTVORGN_EFF_DATE, FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVORGN_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVORGN B WHERE A.FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE = B.FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE AND B.FTVORGN_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

organizationDescription.domainDescription: Description of a UI Administrative Subunit.
organizationDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.
organizationDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVORGN_TITLE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVORGN A WHERE (FTVORGN_EFF_DATE, FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVORGN_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVORGN B WHERE A.FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE = B.FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE AND B.FTVORGN_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

telephoneTypeCode.domainDescription: Code for a telephone usage type.
telephoneTypeCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum of 4 characters.

telephoneTypeDescription.domainDescription: Description of a telephone usage type.
telephoneTypeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

employeeClassCode.technicalDescription: 2-character string composed of two capital letters.

employeeClassDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

emailTypeCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum of 4 characters.

emailTypeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 60 characters.

emailAddress.technicalDescription: Variable length string conforming to RFC 5322 addr-spec.

stateCode.domainDescription: Code for a US State or Canadian province.
stateCode.technicalDescription: 2-character string composed of two capital letters.

stateName.domainDescription: Name of a US State or Canadian Province.
stateName.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 30 characters.

telephoneExtension.domainDescription: Extension number for an individual facility telephone.
telephoneExtension.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 10 characters.

telephoneNumber.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum 12 characters.

payrollYear.domainDescription: A year in the life of payroll.
payrollYear.technicalDescription: 4 character numeric string of the form nnnn representing a year.

payrollNumber.domainDescription: The nth payroll event or period of a payroll type in a payroll year.
payrollNumber.technicalDescription: Integer in the range of 1..12 for monthly and 1..26 for biweekly pay periods. Represented as a two digit decimal number.

payPeriodCode.domainDescription: Mnemonic code for a pay period.

payPeriodDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a pay period.

positionCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies an employment position.

jobDefaultHours.domainDescription: Number of hours defaulted during initial time extract.

timesheetApprovalCategory.domainDescription: Time/leave approval category of the timesheet entry.
timesheetApprovalCategory.technicalDescription: Variable length string having a maximum of 6 characters.

leaveCategoryDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a leave category.

timeEntryActionDescription.validationRule: IN (CASE <timeEntryActionCode> WHEN 'T' THEN 'Report Time' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Request Leave')

timeEntryMethodCode.domainDescription: Code for a time entry method.

timeEntryMethodDescription.domainDescription: Description of a time entry method.
timeEntryMethodDescription.validationRule: IN (CASE <timeEntryMethodCode> WHEN 'P' THEN 'Payroll' WHEN 'W' THEN 'Web' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Departmental' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Third Party')

timeEntryTypeCode.domainDescription: Code for a Time Entry Type.

timeEntryTypeDescription.validationRule: IN (CASE <timeEntryTypeCode> WHEN 'T' THEN 'Time Sheet' WHEN 'E' THEN 'Exception Time Only')

specialRate.domainDescription: Special earnings rate applied to the timesheet entry and earnings type.
specialRate.technicalDescription: Decimal number with two places right of the decimal point.

timeEntryDate.domainDescription: Date on which hours were entered for a timesheet entry and earnings type.

timeEntryHours.domainDescription: Number of hours entered for a timesheet entry and earning type.
timeEntryHours.technicalDescription: Decimal number with two places right of the decimal point.

jobDescription.domainDescription: Title of an Employee Job which supplements the Position Title.

jobEffectiveDate.domainDescription: Effective date of an employee job.

payPeriodStartDate.domainDescription: Date of the start of the Pay Period.

payPeriodEndDate.domainDescription: Date of the end of the Pay Period.

payEventCheckDate.domainDescription: Date on payroll checks written for the Pay Period.

timeEntryStartDate.domainDescription: First date on which time may be entered for the Pay Period.

payPeriodEmployeeWebViewCutoffDate.domainDescription: Date until which the Employee has access to view on the web information for the Pay Period.

payPeriodApproverWebViewCutoffDate.domainDescription: Date until which an Employee who approves the time entry has access to view on the web information for the Pay Period.

timeEntryEndDate.domainDescription: Last date on which time may be entered for the Pay Period.

timeEntryCutoffTime.domainDescription: Time of day on the Time Entry End Date beyond which time may no longer be entered for the pay period.
timeEntryCutoffTime.technicalDescription: 4 character string representing a time in 24 hour hhmm format.

shift.domainDescription: Daily time period for a job.

socialRelationshipCode.domainDescription: Code for a social relationship between two Persons.

socialRelationshipDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a social relationship between two Persons.

prioritySequenceNumber.domainDescription: A sequence number denoting the priority of an associated object.

telephoneCountryCode.domainDescription: A decimal number prefixing a Telephone Number that directs the call to a Country/Nation.

registrationStatusCode.domainDescription: Code for the status of an Academic Course Registration.

registrationStatusDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a status of an Academic Course Registration.
registrationStatusDescription.technicalDescription: Variable-length string having a maximum of 30 characters.

gradingModeDescription.domainDescription: Text description of the Grading Mode.
gradingModeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable-length string having a maximum of 30 characters.

courseReferenceNumber.domainDescription: Unique reference number for a section of a course.

courseSubjectCode.domainDescription: Abbreviation for the subject area of the course.
courseSubjectCode.technicalDescription: Variable-length string having a maximum of 4 characters.

courseNumber.domainDescription: Abbreviation for the subject area of the course.
courseNumber.technicalDescription: Variable-length string having a maximum of 4 characters.

courseScheduleTypeCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies a Course Schedule Type.
courseScheduleTypeCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 3 characters.

courseScheduleTypeDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a Course Schedule Type.
courseScheduleTypeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 30 characters.

buildingCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies a UI Building.
buildingCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 4 characters.

buildingDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a UI Building.
buildingDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 30 characters.

roomCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies a room in a UI Building.
roomCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 6 characters.

partOfTermCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies an academic Part of Term.
partOfTermCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 3 characters.

partOfTermDescription.domainDescription: Text description of an academic Part of Term.
partOfTermDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 30 characters.

scheduleTypeCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies a course schedule type.
scheduleTypeCode.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 3 characters.

scheduleTypeDescription.domainDescription: Text description of a course schedule type.
scheduleTypeDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper case alpha and numeric characters having up to 30 characters.

netId.domainDescription: A UI NetId which can be associated with an Identity.
netId.technicalDescription: Variable length string composed of upper and lower case alpha and numeric characters having up to 30 characters.

udcId.domainDescription: A UI UDC Id which can be associated with an Identity.

credentialType.domainDescription: A type of credential which may be granted to an Identity.

credentialValue.domainDescription: The value of a credential which has been granted to an Identity.

institutionalRoleCode.domainDescription: Code that identifies an Institutional Role.

accountingElementType.domainDescription: A type of financial accounting element as found in an accounting string.

fundCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVFUND_FUND_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVFUND A WHERE (FTVFUND_EFF_DATE, FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVFUND_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVFUND B WHERE A.FTVFUND_FUND_CODE = B.FTVFUND_FUND_CODE AND B.FTVFUND_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

fundDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string of up to 30 characters.
fundDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVFUND_FUND_DESC FROM FIMSMGR.FTVFUND A WHERE (FTVFUND_EFF_DATE, FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVFUND_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVFUND B WHERE A.FTVFUND_FUND_DESC = B.FTVFUND_FUND_DESC AND B.FTVFUND_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVFUND_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

accountCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVACCT_ACCT_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACCT A WHERE (FTVACCT_EFF_DATE, FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVACCT_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACCT B WHERE A.FTVACCT_ACCT_CODE = B.FTVACCT_ACCT_CODE AND B.FTVACCT_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

accountDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string of up to 30 characters.
accountDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVACCT_ACCT_DESC FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACCT A WHERE (FTVACCT_EFF_DATE, FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVACCT_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACCT B WHERE A.FTVACCT_ACCT_DESC = B.FTVACCT_ACCT_DESC AND B.FTVACCT_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVACCT_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

programCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVPROG_PROG_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVPROG A WHERE (FTVPROG_EFF_DATE, FTVPROG_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVPROG_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVPROG_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVPROG B WHERE A.FTVPROG_PROG_CODE = B.FTVPROG_PROG_CODE AND B.FTVPROG_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVPROG_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

programDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string of up to 30 characters.
programDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVPROG_PROG_DESC FROM FIMSMGR.FTVPROG A WHERE (FTVPROG_EFF_DATE, FTVPROG_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVPROG_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVPROG_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVPROG B WHERE A.FTVPROG_PROG_DESC = B.FTVPROG_PROG_DESC AND B.FTVPROG_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVPROG_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

activityCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVACTV_ACTV_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACTV A WHERE (FTVACTV_EFF_DATE, FTVACTV_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVACTV_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVACTV_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACTV B WHERE A.FTVACTV_ACTV_CODE = B.FTVACTV_ACTV_CODE AND B.FTVACTV_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVACTV_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

activityDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string of up to 30 characters.
activityDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVACTV_ACTV_DESC FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACTV A WHERE (FTVACTV_EFF_DATE, FTVACTV_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVACTV_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVACTV_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVACTV B WHERE A.FTVACTV_ACTV_DESC = B.FTVACTV_ACTV_DESC AND B.FTVACTV_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVACTV_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

locationCode.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVLOCN_LOCN_CODE FROM FIMSMGR.FTVLOCN A WHERE (FTVLOCN_EFF_DATE, FTVLOCN_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVLOCN_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVLOCN_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVLOCN B WHERE A.FTVLOCN_LOCN_CODE = B.FTVLOCN_LOCN_CODE AND B.FTVLOCN_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVLOCN_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

locationDescription.technicalDescription: Variable length string of up to 30 characters.
locationDescription.validationRule: IN (SELECT FTVLOCN_LOCN_DESC FROM FIMSMGR.FTVLOCN A WHERE (FTVLOCN_EFF_DATE, FTVLOCN_NCHG_DATE) = (SELECT MAX(B.FTVLOCN_EFF_DATE), MAX(B.FTVLOCN_NCHG_DATE) FROM FIMSMGR.FTVLOCN B WHERE A.FTVLOCN_LOCN_DESC = B.FTVLOCN_LOCN_DESC AND B.FTVLOCN_EFF_DATE <= SYSDATE AND B.FTVLOCN_NCHG_DATE <= SYSDATE)))

activityDate.domainDescription: Date of the last row activity.

effectiveDate.domainDescription: Date that a set of data elements becomes effective.

nextChangeDate.domainDescription: Date that a set of data elements is planned to change.

terminateDate.domainDescription: Date that a set of data elements is planned to terminate active status.

effectiveStatus.domainDescription: Effective status of the data record

financeElementType.domainDescription: An element of a finance accounting string.

eventAction.domainDescription: The Create/Update/Delete action on a data element.

eventDate.domainDescription: The date and time of a data event.

eventId.domainDescription: The identifier of a data event.

objectName.domainDescription: The name of a data object.

objectVersion.domainDescription: The version sequence number of a data object.

dataStoreName.domainDescription: The name of a data store.
